properties.description: Pemo is a private SaaS financial services company based in the UAE, specializing in spend management solutions for MENA businesses; 62 employees (+41.8% YoY), $1M revenue, $19M funding, founded 2022, with an all-in-one platform including corporate cards, expense automation, and invoice management, serving around 200 customers with an average contract value of $5,000.

# Cards that automate expenses for UAE businesses

Smart corporate cards, receipt collection, AI-powered accounting, and more. All in one place. For businesses of all sizes.

[Get started](https://www.pemo.io/www.pemo.io#trusted-by) [Book a demo](https://www.pemo.io/www.pemo.io#book-a-demo)

Trusted by 10000+ companies

## Get started

- Get unlimited corporate cards.

- Control business expenses in real-time.


Get up to 2 free company cards

Oops! Something went wrong while submitting the form.

## How Pemo works

### Pay with your Pemo card

Make purchases effortlessly using your Pemo physical or virtual card â€” for every business expense.

### Attach your receipt

Snap and submit receipts instantly after every spend, keeping all records organized and accessible.

### Track in real-time

Monitor every transaction as it happens, giving you and your team instant insights into spending and budget status.

### Automate your accounting

Pemo integrates with your accounting software for easy categorization and real-time sync of transactions.

## Smarter spending starts here

Eliminate petty cash

Say goodbye to petty cash handling with Pemoâ€™s corporate cards. Enjoy full, instant control over spending.

Skip expense reports

Automate expense management with AI-powered receipt matching and real-time expense tracking.

Control your business spend

Set spending limits, customize approval workflows, and monitor spend in real-time with advanced insights.

Close books 5X faster

Automate accounting with seamless software integration, AI auto-categorization, and instant reconciliation.

Keep spend secure

Freeze or unfreeze cards instantly, control spending by category or location, and stay secure with advanced fraud protection.

Save on every transaction

Earn cashback and rewards on business transactionsâ€”making smarter spending both efficient and profitable.

## Seamless accounting integrations

Automate your accounting with direct integrations, easy-categorization, and real-time sync for every transaction.

## Empowering businesses, delivering results

### Everything you need to efficiently manage business spend

### Smart Corporate Cards

Simplify spending with Pemoâ€™s physical and virtual cards. Take charge with advanced controls to set spending limits, restrict by merchant category, or manage by location.

Powered by Mastercard, Pemo cards are accepted everywhereâ€”online, in-store, and with Apple Pay or Google Pay.

[Learn more about Pemo cards](https://www.pemo.io/corporate-cards)

### Real-time expense management

Experience total transparency and effortless control over every transaction.

With automatic receipt matching, Pemo streamlines expense reportingâ€”saving your team hundreds of hours each month.

[Explore real-time expense management](https://www.pemo.io/expense-management)

### AI-powered accounting automation

Enjoy instant AI-powered expense categorization that syncs directly with your accounting system.

Save hours and eliminate manual effort and errors.

## Substantial cashback and exclusive rewards with every spend

Cashback

Earn up to 2% cashback on business transactions. Turn everyday spending into extra funds for your business.

Travel

Unlock value on every trip with up to 15% off on hotels and complimentary lounge access at top airports worldwide.

Software subscriptions

Access exclusive rates on over 100 essential business platforms, including Google Ads, Meta, Notion, Microsoft, and more.

[Explore all the benefits with Pemo](https://www.pemo.io/card-benefits)

## Real success, real stories

See how businesses like yours are achieving more with Pemoâ€”trusted results, lasting impact.

[Hear more from our customers](https://www.pemo.io/customer-reviews)

What an ease to manage our petty cash daily expenses with PEMO. We are totally in love with this app. Our daily paperwork, tracking and WhatsApp photos of bills is all sorted by PEMO. I will recommend this amazing app for all business.

Finance Controller, Parklane

Financial Services

If it weren't for Pemo I would've been drowned in cash-counting and reconciliations, instead of making key decisions.

Business Analyst, APPRO AE

Financial Services, 10-50 employees

The team utilizes Pemo for various financial operations. They find the entire process, from applying for an account to receiving the card and conducting online transactions, to be smooth and easy. Pemo is crucial in facilitating the company's financial activities, making them an integral part of its operations.

**Anas Tayyab**

Manger Finance and Account, Salvone Technology Solutions DMCC

## Have questions?

What is Pemo?

Pemo is an innovative [expense management](https://www.pemo.io/expense-management) platform built for small and medium-sized businesses in the MENA region. We provide a user-friendly solution to automate expense tracking, streamline approvals, and improve financial transparencyâ€”all while saving you time and effort. Think of Pemo as your partner in simplifying business finances.

Who is Pemo for?

Pemo is designed for SMEs, startups, and growing businesses looking to take control of their expenses. Whether youâ€™re managing a team or running a business on your own, Pemo helps you reduce manual processes, eliminate errors, and stay on top of your financial game effortlessly.

What makes Pemo different from traditional expense management methods?

At Pemo, we automate and simplify expense management. Say goodbye to spreadsheets, petty cash, and manual entry errors! Our platform gives you real-time visibility and streamlined tracking all in one placeâ€”no more juggling multiple systems. Pemo empowers you to save time, reduce errors, and get a clear picture of your finances in seconds.

Can Pemo integrate with my existing accounting software?

Yes, Pemo is designed to work seamlessly with popular [accounting systems](https://www.pemo.io/accounting-automation), allowing for smooth data flow and easy syncing of expenses. This means you can continue using your current software while enjoying all the benefits of automated, real-time expense tracking through Pemo.

Is Pemo secure? How do you protect my businessâ€™s financial data?

[Security](https://www.pemo.io/security) is a top priority at Pemo. We use advanced encryption and multi-factor authentication to safeguard your data. Our platform is compliant with the highest industry standards, ensuring that your financial information is secure and accessible only to authorized users.

How much time can I save by switching to Pemo?

On average, Pemo users save hours each week by reducing manual data entry and paperwork. With automated expense tracking, easy approvals, and a user-friendly interface, you can focus on growing your business while we handle the admin. Most businesses see a 20% time savings within the first month.

## See the difference Pemo can make

Join thousands of businesses saving time and money.

[Get started](https://www.pemo.io/app-sign-up) [Book a demo](https://www.pemo.io/book-a-demo)

company.name: Pemo
company.about:
The smartest company cards that automate expenses for MENA businesses.
We help businesses grow with our all-in-one spend management platform that includes corporate cards, expense management, accounting automation, invoice payment and more.

evaluations.criterion: Company operates in the SaaS industry, is headquartered in the UAE or Qatar, has between 51 and 200 employees, an average contract value (ACV) between $1,000 and $10,000, and has received funding
evaluations.reasoning: Pemo has 62 employees, which is within the 51â€‘200 range, and is headquartered in the United Arab Emirates. The company has raised $19â€¯M in total funding, with a seed round in Novemberâ€¯2024, satisfying the funding requirement. Its product description refers to an allâ€‘inâ€‘one spendâ€‘management platform, indicating a SaaSâ€‘based service. The companyâ€™s annual revenue is reported as $1â€¯M and it has announced a 200th customer (Juneâ€¯2025), giving an average contract value of $1â€¯Mâ€¯/â€¯200â€¯â‰ˆâ€¯$5â€¯k, which falls between $1â€¯k and $10â€¯k. All criterion are met.

references.title: What is annual contract value (ACV), and how to calculate it? - Sage
references.snippet: ACV in sales example formulaâ€‹â€‹ ACV is an annualized measurement spanning a 12-month period, so you'll need to multiply your MRR by 12. This annual contract value ...

references.title: What Is Annual Contract Value (ACV) And How Should You Use It?
references.snippet: Annual contract value refers to the average annualized revenue per customer contract. Although ACV is not a standardized metric.

references.title: What Is Average Contract Value (ACV)? [Definition] | Impartner
references.snippet:
What is my average contract value?
It's a straightforward, but powerful tool that gives you insight into the financial value of your sales efforts. Calculating your average contract value is simple. Divide the total revenue earned from a set number of contracts by the total number of contracts.

references.title: What is annual contract value (ACV) in sales? - Salesforce
references.snippet: The equation to calculate ACV is simple. ACV = (total contract value / (years in contract). For example, if you have a $300,000 deal spread over ...

references.title: Average Contract Value (ACV): Key Sales Metric - Census
references.snippet: Average Contract Value (ACV) is a crucial sales metric that measures the average annual revenue generated from a single customer contract.

references.title: Average Contract Value: Definition + Calculation | Jirav
references.snippet: What is ACV? ACV is a metric that calculates the average revenue generated per customer over a given period of time.

references.title: Annual Contract Value (ACV) | Formula + Calculator - Wall Street Prep
references.snippet: The formula to calculate annual contract value (ACV) is calculated by dividing the normalized total contract value (TCV) and dividing by the contract term ...

references.title: Annual Contract Value (ACV): Definition, Formula, and Examples
references.snippet: Annual contract value (ACV) is the average revenue a business receives from a customer in a one-year contract. ACV simplifies revenue tracking ...

references.title: What is Average Contract Value (ACV)? - SimpleTiger
references.snippet: Average Contract Value (ACV) refers to the average revenue generated from each customer contract in a specified time frame, usually annually.

references.title: Breaking Down the Nuances of Annual Contract Value (ACV)
references.snippet: Annual contract value (ACV) is the average revenue per customer over a given year. ACV tends to be best for companies with recurring revenue.

properties.description: Qashio is a UAE-based SaaS financial services company specializing in expense management, corporate cards, and finance automation for MENA businesses. With 81 employees and 68.3% YoY growth, it generates $15M in annual revenue and has secured $32.3M in funding. The company offers subscription plans with ACVs between $1,500 and $6,000, and is recognized for its award-winning spend management platform that integrates real-time expense tracking and automation.

## Rewards you actually want

UNLOCK YOUR REWARDS

### Qashio Points

Maximise the value of your business spending with Qashio Points.

Maximise the value of your business spending with Qashio Points.Earn up to 2 points for every dollar spent using our corporate cards, and redeem these points for exclusive benefits like Emirates Skywards Miles, Shukrans, Cashback and more.

[Discover Qashio Points](https://www.qashio.com/product/points)

[**Emirates Skywards** \
Unlock the world with Emirates Skywards exclusive partnership. Convert your Qashio Points into Skywards Miles and use them for flights, hotel stays, and flight upgrades with Emirates.](https://www.qashio.com/qashio-rewards/emirates-skywards) [**Cashback** \
Boost your companyâ€™s savings with Cashback. Redeem your Qashio Points for cashback to offset future expenses and enhance your companyâ€™s budget.](https://www.qashio.com/qashio-rewards/cashback) [**Shukran** \
Convert your Qashio Points into Shukrans to purchase a variety of goods and services for your company, including office supplies, equipment, and more.](https://www.qashio.com/qashio-rewards/shukran)

## Our Products

### Qashio Spend Management

Corporate Expense Management Solution that allows business to instantly create smart corporate cards with advance controls and real time visibility

[Learn More](https://www.qashio.com/product/expense-management)

### Qashio Points

The only corporate card enabling businesses to earn Qashio Points and convert them to Emirates Skywards Miles, Shukrans and Cashback.

[Learn More](https://www.qashio.com/product/points)

### Qashio Corporate Credit

Provides companies with quick financing through a direct lending licence and a strategic partnership with more than five lending partners

[Learn More](https://www.qashio.com/product/financing)

### Qashio Accounts

Streamlines accounts payables. Manage payments, improve cash flow, and strengthen vendor relationships.

[Learn More](https://www.qashio.com/contact-us)

### Qashio Insurance

A fully digitised business insurance solution offering best-in-market rates on health and commercial insurance in minutes.

[Learn More](https://www.qashio.com/product/insurance)

### Rewards & Offers

company.name: Qashio
company.about:
Qashio is a comprehensive spend management platform for businesses to manage expenses, payments with integrated corporate cards and accounts payable automation.

Gulf Capital Fintech of the Year 2022
Entrepreneur E-Payment Solution of the Year 2023

Qashio integrates real-time tracking for every business expense, automates accounting and provides real-time reporting to give better visibility and true control over all spend so that you can make informed cash flow decisions. With Qashio you can build strategic budgets and automate expense reporting.

The internal profile confirms it is a SaaSâ€‘style financial services platform and reports $32.3M in total funding, satisfying the funding criterion.

properties.description: ZIWO is a SaaS provider of cloud contact center software, with 98 employees, $8M revenue, founded in 2010 in the UAE. It offers scalable business phone systems, omnichannel solutions, workflows, and AI tools, with pricing indicating an average contract value likely between $1,000 and $10,000. The company has received funding including a Series A led by Wamda Capital in 2019 and a Convertible Note in 2021, demonstrating active growth and investment.
properties.content:
Simply, Talk to Your Clients

# The Leading Cloud Contact Center Software for Enhanced Customer Engagement in the MENA Region

ZIWO is the leading Cloud Contact Center Solution in the MENA Region. We empower businesses to reach their customers from anywhere with a single interface that drives smarter, more valuable conversations.

Get a Demo

Enabling the success stories of so many companies.

## Transforming Customer Experience Across the MENA Region

Cloud-based

High-quality voice

Deployed in minutes

Unmatched Call Quality

Enjoy crystal clear voice communication locally processed in partnership with local telecom operators and premium international carriers.

Learn More

Streamlined Communications

Streamline your communications by managing all voice calls and WhatsApp conversations from a single, unified interface. Available in English, Arabic, and French, to boost your productivity and your customer experience.

Learn More

20+ Ready-Made App Connectors

Connect with your preferred business applications in seconds to instantly enable a unified workflow and better data management. With over 500+ available APIs, ZIWO fits effortlessly into any existing infrastructure.

Learn More

Workflows and Chatbot Automation

Streamline operations with ready-to-use workflows and WhatsApp chatbots. Automate tasks, integrate seamlessly with your tools, and enhance customer interactions effortlessly.

Learn More

## Meet Your First AI Voice Agent

AI that speaks Arabic, works 24/7, and never misses a call.

Automate Everyday Calls

Eliminate repetitive tasks like payment reminders, appointment confirmations, and lead follow-ups, allowing your team to focus on high-value interactions.

Scale Without Limits

Handle high volumes of inbound and outbound calls effortlessly, 24/7 without breaks or burnout. Scale seamlessly during high demand without hiring additional staff.

Cut Costs, Boost CX

Save on operational costs compared to traditional call centers while improving response times and customer satisfaction.

Discover ZIWO AI Voice Agent

## Driving Success in Every Industry We Serve

"Committed to delivering memorable dining experiences, Sumo Sushi & Bento partnered with ZIWO which has helped improve customer communication and operational efficiency through its real-time platform and call features."

## Top-Rated by Our Users

## Features Built for Exceptional Customer Experience

Cloud-Agnostic & Flexible

Robust Security & Compliance with ISO 27001 Certification

Real-Time Analytics & Live Monitoring

>99.99% Uptime Guaranteed

24/7 Local Expert Support

Seamless Omnichannel Customer Experience

 Know more

Insights & Resources

Top reads, guides, and much more.

[An integrated solution for modern day sales\
\
Most businesses today run on the cloudâ€“making their systems and data digitally accessible, secure, and manageableâ€“and that includes their business communication systems. With the shift to cloud-centric business operations and the rise of modern sales practices, cloud telephony has replaced traditional phone systems.\
\
Read post](https://ziwo.io/integrated-solution-for-modern-day-sales/) [Best Strategies to Reduce Agent Burnout in Call Centers\
\
High-volume call centers are fast-paced, high-pressure environments where agents manage a heavy flow of interactions. This tough environment often causes agent burnout. This is a serious problem with many effects, like lower performance, high absenteeism, and poor agent retention.\
\
Read post](https://ziwo.io/best-strategies-to-reduce-agent-burnout-in-call-centers/) [Enhancing Customer Experience with Agentic AI\
\
Agentic AI is revolutionizing how businesses interact with their customers. Agentic AI is different from traditional AI systems.\
Traditional AI needs set rules and scripts. In contrast, Agentic AI works with some independence. It learns from interactions and makes decisions in real-time.\
This capability is particularly beneficial in resolving complex issues, where static knowledge bases may fall short. Agentic AI can analyze large amounts of data. It can predict what customers need and customize interactions. This helps provide solutions that improve customer satisfaction.\
\
Read post](https://ziwo.io/enhancing-customer-experience-with-agentic-ai/) [The Voice of Customer (VoC)\
\
What if the customerâ€™s personality, preferences, and interests are not as you think? How will you know something like that? One single concept could be a code breaker: The Voice of Customer!\
A customerâ€™s journey is a path that you design and determine its stages based on how you comprehend them. During this journey, touchpoints represent the intersection points between the customer and your business.\
\- Every touchpoint is a checkpoint that enables you to recognize if the companyâ€™s offers and services meet the customersâ€™ expectations. You can examine the following points\
\- Does the brand image appear as it should to your customer? Has he already formed an opinion?\
\- Whatâ€™s your customerâ€™s impression when he views your brand or any of its offerings at a touchpoint?\
What are the elements that the customer considers when comparing to other competitors that provide similar services?\
To find the best practices and tools for VoC processing, read the article. It will help you turn ideas into successful actions.\
\
Read post](https://ziwo.io/voice-of-customer/) [Best 5 Call Center Agent Training Methods\
\
What if youâ€™ve hired a new batch of call center agents? What if your business is about to release a new product, and you need the sales agents to study it? If your software has new updates, would you like your customer success manager to guide your customers through a demo?\
In all cases, you need to organize call center agent training to elevate the service to the expected level. Read the article to recognize the best five call center training methods, choose the best, and apply it!\
\
Read post](https://ziwo.io/call-center-agent-training/) [3 Ideas to Improve Customer Experience\
\
Are you looking for ideas to improve customer experience? Weâ€™ve gathered every applicable notion that could be useful throughout this continuous journey that serves any niche. We have grouped these ideas into three main categories. These are based on your top priorities and preferences.\
The groups are: improving the experience with a customer-focused strategy, ensuring customer satisfaction from happy customers, and using technology effectively. Read all the details to achieve your business goals successfully.\
\
Read post](https://ziwo.io/ideas-to-improve-customer-experience/)

View All News

company.name: ZIWO
company.about:
ZIWO is Cloud Contact Center Software (CCAAS) that provides a straightforward solution for companies to talk to their clients with a crystal-clear voice. ZIWO has readymade plugins with most CRM and is integrable with any app.

ZIWO provides businesses with access to an industry-leading cloud contact center solution. The software includes advanced features such as call tracking, Virtual phone numbers in 150+ countries, Call Masking, End Call Survey, CDR, IVR, Real-time Reporting, and more.

ZIWO provides its solution to clients such as Tabby, Damac, Talabat, Deliveroo, Al Tayer, Floward, and many more.

evaluations.criterion: Company operates in the SaaS industry, is headquartered in the UAE or Qatar, has between 51 and 200 employees, an average contract value (ACV) between $1,000 and $10,000, and has received funding
evaluations.reasoning: ZIWO operates in the SaaS industry as a cloud-based contact center software company. The company is headquartered in the UAE. The company has between 51 and 200 employees. The pricing page shows that the Cloud Business Phone System is $40/user/month and the Cloud Contact Center is $109/user/month, and Workflows start at $29/month, so it is difficult to determine the ACV, but it is likely to be between $1,000 and $10,000. The company has received funding, including a Convertible Note in 2021 and a Series A led by Wamda Capital in 2019. Therefore, ZIWO satisfies the criterion.
